GTAPViz: Automating GTAP Data Processing and Visualization with HARplus

This package is currently under development. GTAPViz is designed to streamline the processing and visualization of GTAP model results using HARplus. It enables users to efficiently extract, transform, and visualize data from .sl4 and .har files, reducing the need for manual data handling in GTAP model simulations.
